import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;

public class Homework2_task2 {

	public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException  {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		ChromeDriver driverChrome = new ChromeDriver();
		driverChrome.get("https://iherb.com/");
		driverChrome.manage().window().maximize();	
		
		driverChrome.findElement(By.className("iherb-header-account-sign-in")).click();
		driverChrome.findElement(By.name("Username")).sendKeys("olya.gubenco@gmail.com");
		driverChrome.findElement(By.id("Password")).sendKeys("asDF123*");
		driverChrome.findElement(By.name("button")).click();
		
		


	}

}
